channel.title: Need help please
channel.description: Ok I am kinda new to rsps coding and I know a bit about it like how to palce npcs/etc. um im trying to change my client background. but i cannot locate a sprite folder with the pictures i go into background.java and found this text [code]Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage(location+"Background.png");[/code] And I cannot find out where that file is located? how do i change it, and where do i look please help me =)

item.title: Need help please
item.dc:creator: @sgtlewis sgtlewis
item.description:
@sgtlewis wrote:

Um i dont have skype sorry but i search the client folder for locations and the only files that pop up is Sprite.java/cacheuploader.java/and cache downloader, i also found these

http://webzoom.freewebs.com/kilopscape/uacache3.zip in the cachedownloader.java

http://uncalledattack.zxq.net/Update4.zip" in the cacheuploader.java

Read full topic

item.title: Need help please
item.dc:creator: @purefrostiee purefrostiee
item.description:
@purefrostiee wrote:

[quote=“sgtlewis, post:1, topic:430410”]Ok I am kinda new to rsps coding and I know a bit about it like how to palce npcs/etc. um im trying to change my client background. but i cannot locate a sprite folder with the pictures i go into background.java and found this text

Figure out what the variable “location” equals. Try searching for something like “location =” and see if it’s set somewhere in that file? Justa guess. If you want I could skype you and show ya?

Read full topic
